page.title: 18SMALL COMMUNITIES.
page.content: {Llanbadoc}is a small country hamlet. Llanbadoc has one church. The church is called{ST.MADOCS}Church. Llanbadoc has no shops but one{INN behind the church of {ST. MADOC.} In the churche's slim tower there are two bells. The bells are dated differently one is dated {1667}and the other {1677. } Close to the church there is a motel called the 'Stardust Inn.' The nearest place that people can go for their shopping is {USK.}In the olden days the church used to be called {ST. {MADOC.}Llanbadoc is on the right hand bank of the{RIVER USK.}The river flows right past {ST.MADOC }church Surrounding the church are fir trees and oak trees. Down the road there is the Guide hut of the{1st USK Guide {company.}The hut used to be an old cinema.
